metadata.title: CVE-2018-19539 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in JasPer 2.0.14. There is an access violation inthe function jas_image_readcmpt in libjasper/base/jas_image.c, leading to adenial of service.

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
